headline: 2026 Can Be a Great Year for Banks: 3 Solid Stock Picks
summary: Rate cuts, easing credit stress and renewed deal activity could make 2026 a strong year for banks, with EWBC, USB and KEY standing out.

headline: U.S. Bank Avvance Expands Embedded Financing Network with Three New Integrated Partners
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, December 17, 2025--U.S. Bank today announced the addition of three new integrated partners to its Avvance point-of-sale lending platform, further accelerating the growth of its API-driven embedded financing solutions. KabelSync, Strictly, and United Credit, have launched Avvance as an embedded payment option within their platforms, enabling merchants to offer flexible financing at the point of need.

headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks That Fall Short
summary: Wall Street’s bearish price targets for the stocks in this article signal serious concerns. Such forecasts are uncommon in an industry where maintaining cordial corporate relationships often trumps delivering the hard truth.
